parsed.justification: System A provides a more focused, technically grounded research plan specifically addressing no-code AI evaluation with concrete experiments, detailed methodology, and proper citations, while System B offers a broader philosophical perspective but lacks the same level of technical specificity and experimental rigor for the given research context.

System A provides a more focused, feasible no-code plan tailored to LLM evaluation and RAG, strictly adhering to the skills_gap constraint without suggesting Python learning, while offering deeper methodology critiques, complete experiment ordering, and higher-quality academic literature. System B is broader and inspirational but scattered across multiple disparate experiment types, with less rigorous sourcing and occasional overemphasis on optional coding paths that dilute persona adaptation.
